channel.title: Homes on Robbie C. M. van Aert

item.description: Welcome to my website I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at the department of Methodology and Statistics at Tilburg University and member of the Meta-Research Center. My research interests are statistical methods to conduct meta-analyses and methods to correct for publication bias. I am also a BITSS Catalyst advocating research transparency.
